name: Chess61440
description:
Chess61440 is Bobby Fischer's ultimate game of chess!

Are you tired of the same old openings being played?

Are you sick of the London System?

Do you want to feel like you're solving puzzles when you're playing chess?

Then Chess61440 is the game for you! We've taken all the pieces and scattered them randomly, meaning there are 10s of thousands of different ways to play! Infinite replayability!

Version History:

1.0: Initial launch, no SFX, win by taking the king! Local multiplayer only
